Globals - class com.ecs.utils.Globals.
Class containing all global constants used by the ECSBaseUtils package.
Globals() - Constructor for class com.ecs.utils.Globals
 
generateDocument() - Method in class com.ecs.utils.stellent.DocGenerator
Method for generating a new Stellent document from a template stored in Stellent.

Called either via IdcService GENERATE_DOC_FROM_TEMPLATE or can be embedded as a JavaMethod in a SERVICE or SUB Service.
generateFileNameFromTitle() - Method in class com.ecs.utils.stellent.DocGenerator
Call this method so that the generated document Original filename is set to the passed dDocTitle (reformatted so that it is filename safe).
